titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2022 as "Disability Pride Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2022 as "Disability Pride Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of July 2022 as Disability Pride Month.
